short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy and safe password manage. You can insert mobile data to a website!!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily and securely manage your passwords with QPM (QR Password Manager). Say goodbye to the hassle of manually entering your login credentials every time you visit a website or use an app. With QPM, you can save all your IDs and passwords in one place and access them easily using a QR code.

QPM uses advanced encryption technology to ensure the security of your passwords, while remaining easy to use for even non-technical users. With QPM, you can rest assured that your passwords are safe and secure. Try QPM today and simplify your online life.
